issue.title: [C++] Remove ARROW_GANDIVA_BUILD_TESTS option
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3994](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3994). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is not needed now that both libraries and tests are tied to the same "gandiva" build target and label. So `ninja gandiva && ctest -L gandiva` will build only the relevant targets

Follow up to ARROW-3988
